title: Sumptuous deep blue salty sea
content:
Sumptuous deep blue salty sea
With all its miracles beneath
Whale, keeper of the sea
Humans only on the small
Island with ocean surrounding it.
The tides with their changing breaths
In and out
Quiet, then furious
As the moon changes water to and fro
We are just beginning to comprehend
Grandiosity flowing around us.
Even with our destructive natures,
This underworld seizes us in its manifold , its never ending courses around us.
